autoinfo.name: limit
autoinfo.description: Defines the limits of a scope

autoinfo.name: hidden_trigger
autoinfo.description: Any triggers inside will not be shown as a tooltip

autoinfo.name: custom_trigger_tooltip
autoinfo.description: Works as a trigger with a custom tooltip

autoinfo.name: hidden_effect
autoinfo.description: Effects not shown in the tooltip

autoinfo.name: if
autoinfo.description: Effects that happen only if conditions defined by limit are met

autoinfo.name: effect_tooltip
autoinfo.description: Shows just the tooltip of the effects
